entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:05 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Lake Airport 01:00 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Humidity: 49 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -15.9°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
